channel.title: James Lee Holding Hostages at Discovery Channel HQ
channel.description:
http://www.cnn.com/2010/CRIME/09/01/maryland.discovery.channel/index.html?hpt=T1&iref=BN1
A man possibly armed with explosives is holding a "small number" of hostages at the headquarters of the Discovery Channel in Silver Spring, Maryland, officials said. The suspect, identified by a law enforcement official as James Lee, was earlier believed to be holding only one hostage. "Right now, we have a small number of hostages," Police Chief J. Thomas Manger of the Montgomery County Police Department said.
Edit; They shot him, they won't comment on whether or not he is dead or not, but supposedly the hostages were in danger Edit; His web page: http://savetheplanetprotest.com/ Edit; Courtesy of /b/: [url=http://refreshthing.com/index.php?url=http://www.google.com/search%3Fsourceid%3Dchrome%26ie%3DUTF-8%26q%3DJames%2BJay%2BLee%2BTea%2BParty%2BActivist%2BTakes%2BHostages%2Bat%2BDiscovery%2BChannel&timeout=5]lala[/url] Edit; Dead & website deleted

[quote=“Mopman, post:18, topic:358212”]I think his point was actually that he wants to hear them use the word terrorist. So far I’ve seen “lunatic”, “gunman” and “protester”.

Funny, that.[/quote]

Pretty much. The unjust media.
